title: Ziang Liu
text: Ziang Liu is an Associate Professor in the Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering at Hosei University. He is the head of the Intelligent Systems Laboratory, conducting research in the fields of operations research, optimization, and machine learning.

title: Ziang Liu
